attributes.action: order the production H1N1 vaccine for the whole UK population with all possible speed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should order the production of H1N1 ("swine flu") vaccine for the whole UK population with all possible speed.
This is because a much deadlier second wave of the flu is a strong possibility. It is also very likely that the strain will acquire resistance to anti-viral drugs within the next few months. This could leave the UK population in a very dire situation come Winter 2009.
It should be noted that the very dangerous Spanish Flu of 1918, which went on to kill up to 100 million people, was preceded with a mild first wave. Unless plans to produce a vaccine are fully activated people are left with a terrible dilemma: to try and avoid infection indefinitely or deliberately seek to infect themselves and their families now, while the strain seems to be relatively mild.
